attributes.action: ...tell Leeds United to take their medicine and shut their whingeing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds fans are making themselves look even more ridiculous than we think. Their 10 point deduction was standard and their further 15 point deduction was lenient compared to other cases. Take your punishment and get on with it. You got caught, get over it.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
